column1: FCO have just added Canaries and Balearics to essential travel only as of this evening. Insurance will be invalid if people travel
Yes just seen this.
So it dosent look optimistic for an airbridge to the islands.
Michael Gove publicly ruled out an air bridge for the Islands about an hour ago so the FCO change is no surprise.

This just smacks of the Government wanting to save face after numerous experts have been stating transmission rates in the Canary's is low. Government ballsed up with an over reaction instating quarantine for the islands and instead of being sensible and reversing it they try to save face by extending it. Utter madness.
Thank's for posting this, I'd not heard the news - just been on to Gov website to check.
What insurance is invalid if you travel?
it will be your insurance!
Yes but what does the insurance cover?
I am a big fan of Boris,or at least I was.Some of the decisions being made are baffling.

Martha. For months we were totally locked down. We couldn’t even go outside for 15 minutes to exercise. It wasn’t like the UK. Armed Policía and the civil guard patrolled the streets several times a day, even on sleepy Menorca. Health services virtually ground to a halt. So, please don’t get preaching numbers at us. Over the last 72 hours, Menorca accumulated just 7 new positives. All contacts tracked and traced to source. For this we pay the price of no UK visitors and you seem almost gleeful, gloating! The UK been such a beacon in a dark world of how to get it right!
